00049 //
00050 // ScoredExtentResult
00051 //
00052 // 8 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_SCOREDEXTENTRESULT_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_SCOREDEXTENTRESULT_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "lemur/lemur-platform.h"
00059 
00060 struct ScoredExtentResult {
00061   struct score_greater {
00062   public:
00063     bool operator() ( const ScoredExtentResult& one, const ScoredExtentResult& two ) const {
00064       return one.score > two.score;
00065     }
00066   };
00067 
00068   ScoredExtentResult() :
00069     score(0),
00070     document(0),
00071     begin(0),
00072     end(0)
00073   {
00074   }
00075 
00076   ScoredExtentResult( UINT64 s, int d )
00077     :
00078     score( double(s) ),
00079     document(d),
00080     begin(0),
00081     end(0)
00082   {
00083   }
00084 
00085   ScoredExtentResult( double s, int d )
00086     :
00087     score(s),
00088     document(d),
00089     begin(0),
00090     end(0)
00091   {
00092   }
00093 
00094   ScoredExtentResult( double s, int d, int b, int e )
00095     :
00096     score(s),
00097     document(d),
00098     begin(b),
00099     end(e)
00100   {
00101   }
00102 
00103   ScoredExtentResult( const ScoredExtentResult& other ) {
00104     score = other.score;
00105     document = other.document;
00106     begin = other.begin;
00107     end = other.end;
00108   }
00109 
00110   bool operator< ( const ScoredExtentResult& other ) const {
00111     return score > other.score;
00112   }
00113 
00114   double score;
00115   int document;
00116   int begin;
00117   int end;
00118 };
00119 
00120 #endif // INDRI_SCOREDEXTENTRESULT_HPP
